DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To evaluate safety outcome induction consolidation cytarabine HMMACT term serious infection ( grade 4 ) , time recovery absolute neutrophil count platelet incidence graft versus host disease ( GvHD ) . III . To evaluate feasibility approach term identify suitable donor elderly population . IV . OUTLINE : INDUCTION CHEMOTHERAPY : Patients receive mitoxantrone hydrochloride intravenously ( IV ) day 1-3 cytarabine IV day 1-7 . HMMACT : Patients receive filgrastim ( G-CSF ) mobilize peripheral blood stem cell ( G-PBSC ) day 9 . After completion study treatment , patient follow monthly 3 year .
